projects.title: AI-Powered Code Assistant
projects.description: An intelligent code completion tool using GPT-4 to help developers write better code faster. Features include context-aware suggestions, automated documentation generation, and bug detection.

projects.title: DeFi Lending Protocol
projects.description: A decentralized lending platform built on Gnosis Chain with low fees and high capital efficiency. Supports multiple collateral types and flash loans.

projects.title: Smart Home IoT Hub
projects.description: Blockchain-powered IoT management system with end-to-end encryption and decentralized device authentication. Control your smart home devices securely.
